AnophelesModel 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    creates an xml snippet to be included in an OpenMalaria scenario for the GVI intervention

    get_OM_GVI_snippet.Rd

    get_OM_GVI_snippet This function can be used to create the relevant xml tags for the <GVI> component of the scenario xml file required as input for running the OpenMalaria agent-based simulation model. Precisely, it creates the <mosq> element containing parameters describing the mosquito life cycle, as well as the <nonHumanHosts> element with parameters specific to animal hosts.

    get_OM_GVI_snippet(species, intervention_impact, num_points, plot_f = TRUE)

    Arguments

    intervention_impact

    object created by the AnophelesModel main function

    Value

    TO DO
